source_text: At 5% interest, True Fella Pty Ltd will either need to contribute to joint venture spending or relinquish its interest in the tenure in exchange for a1.0% NSR type royalty.
additional_details: The royalty is received by True Fella Pty Ltd (the vendor) and would be paid by RareX (the Company) if True Fella Pty Ltd chooses to relinquish its 5% ownership stake.
